      • isDocument

        public static boolean isDocument(org.alfresco.webservice.types.NamedValue[] properties)
        this method checks if a node is a document: verify if exists a property named cm:content. It could be improved to support any property that has a datatype d:content.
        Parameters:
        properties -
        Returns:
        TRUE if the node is a document, otherwise FALSE

      • isFolder

                        throws org.apache.manifoldcf.core.interfaces.ManifoldCFException
        Check if the current node has associated children
        Parameters:
        session -
        node -
        Returns:
        TRUE if the reference contains a node that is an Alfresco space, otherwise FALSE
